attributes.action: Force the banks to repay more than the amount lent to them by the government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make amends for the misery and hardship caused by the greed and mismanagement of the banks they ought to be forced to repay more than they were lent in order to help fund social and welfare projects thereby helping the least fortunate sections of our society.
